oai_dc:dc.dc:title: For a study of definable representations of algebraic groups
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Deloro, Adrien
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Logic
Mathematics - Group Theory
20F11
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We classify irreducible SL(2,K)-modules of low Morley rank (at most 4.rk(K)) as a first step towards a more general conjecture.
